name: Kubernetes Outside of Docker
description: Re-use the host Kubernetes cluster from within a dev container. Configures kubectl to access clusters running on the host machine including Docker Desktop, kind, minikube, and others.

enableTunnel.description: Enable network tunnel for container-to-host connectivity

enableTLS.description: Configure TLS settings for container environment

kubeconfigPath.description: Custom path for kubeconfig file (defaults to user home .kube/config)

github.copilot.chat.codeGeneration.instr.text: This dev container has kubectl configured to access the host Kubernetes cluster. Use kubectl commands to interact with the cluster running on the host machine.
